channel.title: Michael Shanks on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Shanks on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Together’ Filmmaker Michael Shanks Breaks Down the Necessity of His Film’s Memorable Sex Scene
item.description: “It’s certainly not a scene for titillation. It’s a scene of tension and cringe," says the filmmaker of the moment between real-life married couple Alison Brie and Dave Franco.
